name: GitHub Agentic Workflows
description: Technical preview feature automating repository tasks using AI agents within GitHub Actions. Write workflows in plain Markdown instead of YAML, and let AI handle issue triage, pull request reviews, CI failure analysis, and repository maintenance. Works with GitHub Copilot CLI or other coding agents.
community_quotes: Write workflows in plain Markdown instead of complex YAML
Security-first design with read-only by default and sandboxed execution
Works with multiple coding agents - same workflow format across all engines

name: Klaw.sh
description: Kubernetes-like system specifically designed for orchestrating AI agents and workflows. Provides fleet management for AI agents with clusters, namespaces, and declarative deploys. Standalone binary with zero dependencies.
community_quotes: Giving an LLM a computer makes it way more powerful, giving it a kubernetes cluster should extend that power much further
This abstraction can scale for a good long while
Standalone binary, zero dependencies - same mental model as k8s without the infrastructure overhead
Fleet ops for agents - k8s solved deploy/observe/isolate for containers, you're mapping that to agent workers

name: Tambo 1.0
description: Open-source toolkit for agents that render React components. A Generative UI SDK for React that enables AI-driven UI generation, featured on Hacker News with significant community interest.
community_quotes: Open-source toolkit for agents that render React components

name: obra/superpowers
description: An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works. Provides a structured approach to building AI-powered development workflows with agent coordination and task management capabilities.

name: ChromeDevTools/chrome-devtools-mcp
description: Chrome DevTools for coding agents. A TypeScript-based tool that provides Chrome DevTools integration specifically designed for AI coding agents to enable better debugging and inspection capabilities.

name: rowboatlabs/rowboat
description: Open-source AI coworker, with memory. A TypeScript-based AI assistant designed to work alongside developers with persistent memory capabilities for maintaining context across sessions.

name: SynkraAI/aios-core
description: Synkra AIOS: AI-Orchestrated System for Full Stack Development - Core Framework v4.0. A comprehensive framework for AI-orchestrated full-stack development with agent coordination capabilities.
community_quotes: AI-Orchestrated System for Full Stack Development

name: openclaw/openclaw
description: Your own personal AI assistant. Any OS. Any Platform. The lobster way. An open-source AI coding assistant that works across different platforms and operating systems with impressive community traction.
community_quotes: Your own personal AI assistant. Any OS. Any Platform

name: alibaba/zvec
description: A lightweight, lightning-fast, in-process vector database from Alibaba. Critical infrastructure for AI-powered applications requiring efficient vector similarity search and memory operations.

name: letta-ai/letta-code
description: The memory-first coding agent. A TypeScript-based AI coding assistant with persistent memory capabilities that help it maintain context across coding sessions for more effective long-term collaboration.
